abstract: The market was momentarily excited Wednesday by rumors that Microsoft might be angling to buy Electronic Arts, but the software giant quickly poured cold water on the speculation.
snippet: The market was momentarily excited Wednesday by rumors that Microsoft might be angling to buy Electronic Arts, but the software giant quickly poured cold water on the speculation.
lead_paragraph: The market was momentarily excited Wednesday by rumors that Microsoft might be angling to buy Electronic Arts, but the software giant quickly poured cold water on the speculation.

headline.main: Microsoft Quashes Electronic Arts Deal Chatter
